title: Netezza Performance Server
introduction: Welcome to the Netezza Performance Server for Cloud Pak for Data as a Service product documentation.

section_recommended.title: Provision a service instance
section_recommended.description: Create and deploy a Netezza Performance Server service instance.

section_recommended.title: Pause and resume instances
section_recommended.description: Learn how to pause and resume your Netezza Performance Server instances.

section_recommended.title: Query data from data lakes
section_recommended.description: Learn how to use external tables to access parquet files that are stored outside of your database in data lakes (on AWS S3), and analyze this data by using the robust and massively parallel Netezza Performance Server execution engine.

section_recommended.title: Web console documentation
section_recommended.description: Learn how to access and use the Netezza Performance Server web console.
